Question
========

We denote the weight of a person in pounds by the stochastic variable Y. In a given population, μ~Y~ = 140 and σ^2^~Y~ = 900. We now want to represent the weights in kilograms and use the variable X for this purpose. In this population, expectation μ~X~ and variance σ^2^~X~:

Answerlist
----------

* ΜX = 70 and σ2X = 450
* ΜX = 70 and σ2X = 225
* ΜX = 140 and σ2X = 225
* ΜX = 280 and σ2X = 3600

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* ΜX = 70 and σ2X = 450: Incorrect
* ΜX = 70 and σ2X = 225: Correct
* ΜX = 140 and σ2X = 225: Incorrect
* ΜX = 280 and σ2X = 3600: Incorrect
